Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Chicago
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison, and Cicero due to, street blockage at Cicero/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison, and Cicero due to, street blockage at Cicero/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
